sentences.sContent: If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.sContent_eng: If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.sCn: 如果上帝关住一个你的水龙头，他能开启另一个”。

sentences.sContent: Your security is not in your bank account; your security is in the Lord. If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your security is not in your bank account; your security is in the Lord. If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.sCn: “你的安全并不在你的银行账户里；而在于上帝。如果上帝关住一个你的水龙头，他能开启另一个”。

sentences.sContent: Really, a user experience designer could help to improve a person’s experience with just about anything —a doorknob, a faucet, a shopping cart.
sentences.sContent_eng: Really, a user experience designer could help to improve a person’s experience with just about anything —a doorknob, a faucet, a shopping cart.
sentences.sCn: 诚然，用户体验设计师可以帮助人们提高几乎关于任何事物——一个门把手，一个水龙头，一个购物车——的体验。

trans.tranOther: the thing that you turn on and off to control the flow of water from a pipe
